survey_name: Employee Feedback on AI-Powered Workplace Automation Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the adoption, usability, and perceived benefits of AI-powered workplace automation tools within their organization.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the AI-powered automation tools currently available in your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the AI-powered automation tools currently available in your workplace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered automation tools do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with optional open-text for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following AI-powered automation tools do you use regularly? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How has the introduction of AI-powered automation tools impacted your daily work efficiency?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected any tool in Q2 except 'None of the above'
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for nuanced feedback.

script.question_text: How has the introduction of AI-powered automation tools impacted your daily work efficiency?
